name: web_worker_storage
description: A WebStorage interface backed by a web worker

scripts.build: npx webpack --mode=production --config webpack_web_worker.config.js && cp ./dist/web_worker.js ./storage/web_worker.txt && npx webpack --mode=production --config webpack.config.js && mv dist/storage/*.d.ts* dist/ && mv dist/web_worker/*.d.ts* dist/
scripts.build_development: npx webpack --mode=development --config webpack_web_worker.config.js && cp ./dist/web_worker.js ./storage/web_worker.txt && npx webpack --mode=development --config webpack.config.js && mv dist/storage/*.d.ts* dist/ && mv dist/web_worker/*.d.ts* dist/

author: Lukas Schoerghuber
